content.description:
Haec1 siccissiccus, -a, -um, adj.: dry cum oculis neminem vel legere vel audire 
posse aestimoaestimo, -are: to believe.
 1:refers to the contents of a letter↩
content.question: In the sentence, what does siccis cum oculis specify?

choices.label: Where someone may react to the letter
When someone may react to the letter
Why someone may react to the letter
How someone may react to the letter

content.answer: How someone may react to the letter

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
